approveTranchePTOnBalancer(address).details: Approve balancer vault to spend this contract's tranche tokens (PTs aka fixed yield tokens)

checkTranchePTAllowanceOnBalancer(addres.details: Check allowance of balancer vault for spending this contract's tranche tokens (PTs aka fixed yield tokens)

compound(uint8,address,bytes32,uint256,u.details: assume user has approved this contract for base tokens.

params._amount: The amount of base tokens supplied initially
params._balancerPoolId: of the pool containing PTs and Base Tokens. AMM formula is constant power sum formula.
params._n: the number of compounding to do
params._trancheAddress: the element.fi tranche contract address for the token to compound

returns._0: number of YTs user obtained, number of base tokens spent (useful for YTC calculator)

compound(uint8,address,bytes32,uint256,u.notice: Do Yield Token Compounding i.e. convert base tokens to PTs, YTs and sell PTs for base tokens and reconvert for more YTs recursively

userdoc.notice: Yield Token Compounding on top of element.finance.
